author: Ivan Mehta
title: India’s courts are switching to video conferencing to hear cases
description: In terms of the number of registered coronavirus per country, India is quite far down the list. However, the government isn’t taking the pandemic lightly as the virus can spread rapidly. So, after observing a nationwide 14-hour curfew on Sunday, various state…
